pr_title: Minor changes to keycloak-authorization docs and lower case for enum properties

timeline.message: [fixes #8469] - Minor changes to keycloak-authorization docs and lower case for enum properties

timeline.bodyText:
This isn't the right fix. We need to hyphenate the values.
Are you sure that just removing @DefaultConverter didn't fix your issue altogether? From the code, I think it would and you don't need to change anything else.
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: It fixes, thanks. Not sure though why it did not work when I first tried to remove the default converter ...
replies.author: pedroigor
